meta.description: Tiny sample set for severity engine evaluation

items.text: Tenant must provide a security deposit equal to 2 months rent.
The tenant may terminate the agreement with one month notice and no penalty.
The landlord reserves the right to terminate this agreement at their sole discretion with a 7-day notice.
A security deposit of 5 months' rent is required. There is also a 6-month lock-in period.
The late fee for rent payments will be 5% of the monthly rent.
This clause outlines the procedure for routine maintenance, which is tenant's responsibility.
The agreement shall be renewed annually upon mutual consent.
Any dispute arising from this agreement shall be settled through arbitration in a neutral city.
